unnormalised: Hey everyone, rooftop solar subsidies are a great idea, right?
normalised: Hey everyone, rooftop solar subsidies are a great idea, right?

unnormalised: Especially in a sunny place like Chennai.
normalised: Especially in a sunny place like Chennai.

unnormalised: Heard the MNRE is pushing this hard.
normalised: Heard the M N R E is pushing this hard.

unnormalised: Rs. 50,000 subsidy could really help many families.
normalised: Rupee fifty thousand subsidy could really help many families.

unnormalised: Imagine, lighting up your home with solar during Diwali!
normalised: Imagine, lighting up your home with solar during Diwali!

unnormalised: Plus, less load on the grid - good for everyone.
normalised: Plus, less load on the grid - good for everyone.

unnormalised: Maybe we can cook some delicious biryani using only solar power.
normalised: Maybe we can cook some delicious biryani using only solar power.

unnormalised: Even my neighbour, Mr. Sharma, is considering it.
normalised: Even my neighbour, Mister Sharma, is considering it.
